Articles.Content:
am i wrong or?

i noticed that debris doesn't overheat on re-entry and explode, you can even use it as a shield

You are correct. I believe heat is only modeled on the active vessel. Most of that time that is not an issue, as it is still very difficult to exploit. Even your "using it as a shield" example is not really a viable exploit because you could just not decouple the debris and let it explode. By the time it does, most likely you will be through most of the heat and you have still effectively used it as a shield.
